entry.title: Soap Saver
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 4.25

Save your Soap! Prevent a wasteful soapy puddle and a mushy bar of soap by elevating your soap and allowing the entire bar to dry evenly. Great for kitchens, bath sinks, tubs, or showers and can be trimmed to fit any soap dish. 

Just needs a quick rinse under a faucet to clean.

Save your money and our planet by replacing your plastic liquid refill bottles with good old fashioned, eco friendly bar soap!

Includes: 1 Soap Saver

entry.title: Bamboo Charcoal Air Purifier Sachet
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 3.75 - 4.25 (12 variants)

Stylishly deodorize your closets, hockey bags, damp basement, pet odours etc, and keep the air feeling fresh in the rooms you spend most of your time in.

Composed of 100% bamboo oxygenated charcoal, they are eco-friendly, chemical & fragrance free and safe to use around pets and children. 🐾👶

Bamboo Charcoal Sachets create odour free spaces by absorbing contaminants and microorganisms in the air. That means they’ll trap allergens and bacteria particles that cause the odours, actually reducing bad smells instead of masking them!

The sachet can last for many years if properly cared for – to rejuvenate, place in direct sunlight for about an hour as needed, and back to work it goes!

Includes: 1 Bamboo Charcoal Sachet 
Choose from: Square $4.25 – 11 cm x 15 cm
Slim $3.75 – 7 cm x 9 cm

entry.title: Jute Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 2.25

Stylish and sustainable storage for your bulk coffee beans, candy etc. A beautiful home is created in the details!

"Jute" is the name of the renewable, natural plant fibre used to make burlap, composed primarily of the plant materials cellulose and lignin.

Jute bags are reusable, environmentally friendly, 100% bio-degradable and recyclable. They're strong and can carry more weight compared to promotional carry bags.


Includes: 1 Jute Bag - 12" height x 8" width

entry.title: Tru Earth Laundry Strips
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 19.95

Help us keep 700,000,000 plastic jugs out of landfills per year! 🌎

Tru Earth Eco-Strips are the smartest way to clean your clothes! Ultra-concentrated, hypoallergenic, eco-friendly cleaning power in a tiny, pre-measured strip of detergent that you just toss in the wash.

Low-sudsing for all washing machines, including high-efficiency (HE). The smart hypoallergenic laundry detergent formulation effectively dislodges dirt molecules and stains, keeping them in suspension until they are rinsed away. These strips make your laundry washing easier, healthier and kinder on our planet. 

Take back your storage space! Tru Earth Eco-strips liberate your valuable cupboard space with efficient rectangular packaging. (Package dimensions: length 22cm, width 14cm, height 2cm)

Detergent that cares for the future of our planet: Smart, lightweight design reduces transportation costs and global-warming carbon emissions by 94% in comparison to today’s leading-brand liquid and powder detergent.

If everyone switched to Tru Earth Eco-Strips: 700 million plastic jugs would be saved from going to landfills per year. The truck fuel and CO2 emissions saved would be like taking 27 million cars off the road for a day or planting nine million trees!

Clean, green, and simple: Finally a laundry detergent as sensitive to your skin as it the environment! When you use Tru Earth Eco-Strips, you will feel confident that you are taking care of your family, and their future on this planet. Hypoallergenic and paraben free.

Experience uncompromising cleaning power that: removes the toughest stains, reveals vibrant colours, restores radiant whites, no measuring & no mess, zero-waste compostable packaging, dissolves completely in Hot or Cold water, works in all washing machines, including HE. Front loads or top loads.

Tru Earth Certifications: 
Paraben-free
Phosphate-free
Free of added dyes
Free of chlorine bleach
Free of 1,4-dioxane, as certified by independent laboratory tests
Readily biodegradable in accordance with OECD 310D
Hypoallergenic, certified by independent dermatologists
Vegan: no animal-based ingredients or testing on animals by us or our ingredient suppliers
Manufactured in Canada 

Ingredients:

Vegetable Glycerin: plant-derived from soy softener
Starch: plant-derived from maize biodegradability booster
PVA (polyvinyl alcohol): biodegradable supporting matrix
Potassium Sorbate: Food grade preservative
Light Mineral Oil: Used in manufacturing as a processing aid. (not an active product ingredient)
Cocamido propyl betaine: coconut oil based, biodegradable amphoteric surfactant (cleaning agent) and foam booster
Sodium Gluconate: plant-derived and food-grade, biodegradable water softener that prevents soil from resettling on fabric after it has been removed during washing
Lauryl dimethyl amine oxide: plant-derived, biodegradable non-ionic surfactant (cleaning agent) and foam stabilizer
Sulfonic acids, C14-16-alkane hydroxy and C14-16-alkene, sodium salts: biodegradable surfactant (cleaning agent)
Glycereth cocoate: plant derived and food grade, biodegradable water softener
Caprylyl Glucoside, Octyl Glucoside: non-ionic surfactants (cleaning agents)
Fragrance oil blend (not used in Fragrance Free): natural essential oils and synthetic ingredients
Residual Water
Tru Earth Eco-Strips are palm oil free & gluten free

Note: As part of our commitment to continuously improve sustainability, optical brightener (a common ingredient in leading-brand detergents) was phased out of manufacturing in March 2013. Sodium lauryl ether sulfate (SLES) was phased out of production in October 2013 and Tru Earth laundry strips are now SLS and SLES free. Tru Earth Eco-Strips technology is licensed from Dizolve Group Corporation and distributed via the Tru Earth brand. Tru Earth is an MPM Group of Brands company.

PDF - Material Safety Data Sheet - Fragrance / PDF - Material Safety Data Sheet - Unscented


Includes: 1 Box Tru Earth Eco-Strips - 32 Strips = 32 Loads
Package dimensions: Length 8.7" (22cm) Width 5.5" (14cm) Height 0.8" (2cm)

entry.title: HopePodz Cleaning Refills - Pack of 3
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 15.99

Now we can refill, not LANDfill our household cleaners 🌎

Save an empty spray bottle from the recycle bin, drop in your pod, top with water. That's it!

HopePodz are a chemistry wonder - the pouch is polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) NOT plastic! PVA is 100% biodegradable and fully dissolvable in water. Coolstraw.ca sources the best in zero waste, plastic free, non-toxic, biodegradable cleaning!

Thank you for helping to save the planet!

Choose From:
HopePodz TrioPac: powerful, pro-cleaning formulas that save 3 bottles from the landfill!
Ingredients:  Ethoxylated alcohols C9-C11 blend, Hexylene glycol, Propylene glycol, Water, Synthetic fragrance (lavender)*, dye
Includes: 3 pods – 1 Glass cleaner + 1 Bathroom cleaner + 1 Multi-surface cleaner (each makes 946mL) 
 
HopePodz Disinfectant Kit: kills 99.99% of bacteria and viruses - professional concentrated refills to safely clean and disinfect your home as per Health Canada’s guidelines. (DIN #02510316)
Ingredients:  Octyl decyl dimethyl ammonium chloride 15.24% W/W, Dioctyl dimethyl ammonium chloride 7.62% W/W, Didecyl dimethyl ammonium chloride 7.62% W/W, Alkyl (50% C14, 40% C12, 10% C16), Dimethyl benzyl ammonium chloride 20.32% W/W, Alcohol (C11) Ethoxylate, Hexylene Glycol, Ethanol, water, synthetic fragrance*, dye
Includes: 3 pods – 1 Disinfectant refill + 2 Multi-Surface refills (each makes 946mL)

* While the lavender scent is very mild, HopePodz might not be suitable for individuals with scent sensitivities. To note, HopePodz has received feedback from customers with Multiple Chemical Sensitivities who find the cleaners smell “clean” and not like lavender at all! There are no scent-free, dye-free formula options yet. These are on the manufacturer's product development radar, along with a plant-based formula. Stay tuned!

entry.title: Beeswax Food Wraps - Set of 3
entry.summary:
Vendor: Cool Straw
Type:
Price: 12.25

Imagine never, ever needing to find the end of the roll of the plastic wrap again! Beeswax food wraps are the kind of product that, after they are in your house, you don’t know how you lived without. 

These hard-working organic cotton cloths, infused with beeswax, tree resin and organic jojoba oil, will be in continual use in your kitchen.

Stays stiff and in place when wrapped around a bowl, yet supple enough to fully cover a piece of fruit. Line a basket or non-food grade vessel for a salad!

Two or three packages would be enough for most family kitchens, and they’re super kid-friendly as there’s no sharp cutting edge that you’d find on a plastic roll.

Easy to wash – just a dab of soap in your hand and rub; rinse and hang to dry.

Includes:  3 Beeswax Wraps –
(1) 7 × 8 inches
(1) 10 × 11 inches
(1) 12 × 14 inches
